title: FIGHT: The Complete Series
description: *The complete, 3 book FIGHT series by M. Dauphin for one low price!!* Eddie. He’s sworn off all relationships, relying on one night stands to fill his time and needs in the bedroom. When Red storms into his life, the feisty MMA fighter is nothing like he’s ever imagined. Neither of them want it, but soon they’re falling hard for each other, just in time for past demons and present evil to make living a normal life seen almost impossible. Can they fight past the hardships and find their happy, or will they give up when the going gets tough?
author: M. Dauphin
